Title: Shin Dokonjou Gaeru: Dokonjou Yumemakura
Description: ['After Hiroshi daydreams about marrying Kyoko, his chauvinistic behavior puts a strain on his relationship with his closest of friends.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Shounen Ashibe', 'Sequel: Shounen Ashibe 2', 'Alternative version: Shounen Ashibe: Go! Go! Goma-chan']
